directions: Combine 3 1/2 cups watermelon pieces, frozen + 1/2"-thick jalapeño slice, with seeds + 6 ounces tequila blanco + 4 ounces simple syrup + 2 ounces fresh lime juice + 3 cups ice optional garnish: Watermelon wedges and sliced jalapeños.
ingredients: Optional garnish: Watermelon wedges and sliced jalapeños
title: Watermelon, Lime, and Tequila
